review: Beats chromecast everyday! Amazon created an app so its compatible with iPhone now which is even better! Works flawlessly and remote works amazing when trying to search things, much better than the typical remote. I would highly recommend this to anyone who is thinking about a smart stick, beats the rest no problem.

review: This has been a great product.  It is small and discrete so our apartment has kept clean.  Additionally, it is easy to use with lots of variety so we have actually become more social as a result.  I love the fact that it has Pandora.
author: Andrew T Pickens

review: I love, love, love my Amazon Fire Stick!!!  I can finally watch my streaming shows with my boyfriend without having to crowd in front of the laptop.  Not that I don't love the closeness - but sometimes you want to share a meal while watching "American Horror Story".Set up is EASY and getting all my content took mere minutes.  I love the stick - a great (cheap) investment.
